string.name: NoMoreLikeCount
string.value: You've used up all of your Likes for today.

string.name: AlreadyRegisteredAccount
string.value: That character is already on your friends list.

string.name: NoPermission
string.value: You don't have permission to visit that home.

string.name: ReachedToVisitLimit
string.value: There are already too many people visiting that home.

string.name: myHomeInvite
string.value: You received an invitation to %s's home.

string.name: NoRandomAccess
string.value: There are currently no homes available for a random visit.

string.name: myHomeDefaultName
string.value: %s's Home

string.name: ChangeStatusOnlyInMyHome
string.value: Your status message can be set only in your Home.

string.name: myHomeName
string.value: Home Name

string.name: nickName
string.value: Custom Nickname

string.name: statusMessage
string.value: Status Message

string.name: QuestReqNotMet
string.value: You must complete the pre-requisite quest before viewing that Caretaker's details.

string.name: ConfirmChangeTemplate
string.value: If you rebuild your home from a new blueprint, you will be unable to enter it for 1 minute. Additionally, all furnishings will be moved to your storage box, and their arrangement will not be saved.\r\nDo you want to continue?

string.name: MovedToInventory
string.value: You unlocked the {0} customization for use.

string.name: AlreadyRegisteredItem
string.value: You already own that building customization.

string.name: ConfirmDelete
string.value: You will receive %d Home coin(s) for selling the selected furnishings.\r\nThis action is irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

string.name: ConfirmDeleteNoRefund
string.value: Selling this furnishing will not yield an Home Coins, and it will be irretrievably destroyed.\r\nAre you sure you want to continue?

string.name: GiveCoinFail
string.value: You were unable to receive any Home Coins. Make sure you have enough space in your inventory.

string.name: CannotDelete
string.value: You cannot sell furnishings that are in active use.

string.name: MovedToInventory
string.value: %s has been moved to your furnishing storage box.

string.name: SameTypeInstalled
string.value: A furnishing with the same function has already been placed. While you can place multiple of the same furnishing, any special functions or effects will not be duplicated.

string.name: StoreAll
string.value: All furnishings that are currently placed will be sent to storage. Do you want to proceed?

string.name: NoInstance
string.value: That player does not have a Home.

string.name: InvalidItem
string.value: That furnishing is invalid.

string.name: OutOfFurnitureSlot
string.value: Your furnishing slots are full.

string.name: TooFar
string.value: You need to get closer.

string.name: AlreadyInUse
string.value: That furnishing is already in use.

string.name: GetConfirm
string.value: Do you want %s x1?

string.name: transactionConfirm
string.value: A fee of %d mesos will be deducted.

string.name: TakeBackConfirm
string.value: Do you want to retrieve the\r\n%s you placed here?

string.name: InvalidItem
string.value: That item can't be placed here.

string.name: OutOfStock
string.value: There are no items left.

string.name: UnknownError
string.value: An unknown error occurred.

string.name: HowMany
string.value: How many do you want to store?

string.name: DailyLimitOver
string.value: You can only take %d item(s) each day.

string.name: OnlyOncePerDay
string.value: Item can be obtained only once a day per display.

string.name: OnlyOne
string.value: You can only place one Mysterious Treasure Chest furnishing.

string.name: InvalidItem
string.value: That item can't be placed here.

string.name: HowMany
string.value: How many will you place?

string.name: ConfirmStart
string.value: Placing this item will activate the mini-game. You will not be able to stow the item or change your home's blueprint until the game is concluded. Are you sure you still want to place it?

string.name: CannotStore
string.value: You cannot change your home to another blueprint while a furnishing is in use, nor move or retrieve a furnishing that is in use. Please try again later.

string.name: NotOpen
string.value: Game has not been prepared.

string.name: WaitRetry
string.value: You must wait {} sec before attempting another guess.

string.name: PasswordSuccess
string.value: %s cracked the passcode and obtained the chest's treasure.

string.name: TimeOver
string.value: Time is up. The mini-game has ended.

string.name: CannotDelete
string.value: You cannot retrieve that furnishing without first claiming the treasure chest's reward. Claim the reward and try again.

string.name: isReboot
string.value: That mini-game cannot be played in Reboot World.

string.name: OnlyOne
string.value: You can only place one Punch Machine furnishing.

string.name: alreadySummon
string.value: You are already using the Punch Machine.

string.name: waiting
string.value: Another person is currently using the Punch Machine.

string.name: CannotStore
string.value: You cannot change your home to another blueprint while a furnishing is in use, nor move or retrieve a furnishing that is in use. Please try again later.

string.name: askReset
string.value: Do you want to reset the machine's rankings?

string.name: CannotReset
string.value: You cannot reset the rankings while the mini-game in progress.\r\nPlease try again when the mini-game ends.
